attributes.action: resign immediately as the state of the economy is unacceptable.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The economy is in a poor state. Inflation during May 2008 alone, measured using the CPI, was 0.8%. It stands at 3.0% annually; however, this is certain to rise as the year draws on. Unemployment stands at 5.3% and the UK has a balance of payments deficit of £8.5 billion. Despite the global economic climate, better management of UK monetary and fiscal policy, as well as immigration, would result in the UK being in a much healthier state. Only a more apt Prime Minister would be able to change this.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
